cuisine_description_en: Cuisine of the Chinese disapora, including Taiwan and United States
Cantonese (Yuè, 粵) cuisine, from Southern China, features iconic elements like smoky wok hei flavor, well-balanced sauces, use of fresh seafood, and the rich tradition of dim sum
Jiangnan (including Jiangsu, Shanghai, Zhejiang) cuisine, from Eastern China, is known for dishes with refined flavors and delicate textures
Sichuan (Chuān, 川) cuisine, from Western China, is famous for its bold and spicy flavors, often featuring numbing Sichuan peppercorns and fiery chili peppers
